issue.title: [C++ Feature Request] Add GetCliendId to Plasma Store
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11550](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11550). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Let user to get unique client id on plasma store. This enables user to generate unique object ID by algorithm such as snowflake, instead of using random object id
